points.innovation: Innovation in delivering new and creative services, exploring opportunities and projects for more success.

points.exceed_expectations: Providing services that exceed customer expectations.

aboutUsPage.title: Wakan Investment
aboutUsPage.intro: A leading company providing suitable solutions for all business sectors
aboutUsPage.partnership: Wakan collaborates with the Kafalah program for SMEs
aboutUsPage.experience: We have over a hundred years of experience

aboutUsPage.summary: Wakan's team consists of consultants with distinguished advisory expertise, maintaining long-term client relationships based on professionalism and trust. We embrace flexibility and adapt to local and international changes, offering the best financial solutions with favorable terms and low-profit margins. Wakan is home to experts with specialized and accumulated experience.

restructuringSer.title: Restructuring and Organization
restructuringSer.description: We provide innovative solutions for financial and administrative restructuring through the following steps

steps.reasons: Agreeing on the reasons that led to the change
steps.alternatives: Studying the available alternatives for restructuring
steps.execution: Initiating the process to achieve the desired results professionally
steps.analysis: Analyzing results and providing comprehensive reports on strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and challenges
steps.risks: Assessing potential risks and finding solutions to mitigate them
steps.financing: Setting financing alternatives and expected returns for each

projectFinancing.title: Project Financing
projectFinancing.description: Identifying suitable financial needs for establishing or growing the project, selecting the best financing sources with the lowest investment costs, and aligning funding with the nature of the project to ensure successful financing.
projectFinancing.services: Financing services include project evaluation, feasibility studies, and recommendations on appropriate financing.

mergersAcquisitions.title: Mergers and Acquisitions
mergersAcquisitions.description: We assist investors and decision-makers in prioritizing and meeting their needs in mergers and acquisitions through:

steps.strategy: Developing and implementing a mergers and acquisitions strategy
steps.execution: Completing the process professionally to achieve the desired results

feasibilityStudies.title: Feasibility Studies
feasibilityStudies.description: We ensure accuracy when preparing feasibility studies through:

steps.marketStudies: Supervising the preparation of market and technical studies
steps.projectAnalysis: Analyzing the project from all aspects, including strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and challenges
steps.riskAssessment: Assessing project risks and finding ways to mitigate them
steps.financingAlternatives: Providing financing alternatives and expected returns for each option
steps.financialIndicators: Presenting feasibility study results, financial indicators, and sensitivity analysis

footer.location: Click on Google Map to reach us
